channel.title: PK Palace - Wildy icon!?!
channel.description:
Hey guys.
PK Palace base, and when you attack a player, it stops the player chat for you 2 players appearing, now im sure that this is something to do with the fact that on other client (Not Moparscape) when you attack another player, you get an icon above your head (A mix between two prayer icons attempting to draw a skull). This must be the problem with Mopar? Although: I have tried looking for where it is telling the client to show the icon I CANNOT FIND IT!
I have searched the player update masks, and they are all fine, i've checked the method for clicking the attack option on a player, and also the attack boolean, i see nothing wrong..
Has anyone got an idea for what i'm looking for? Please help!! [b]Thanks!![/b]

item.title: PK Palace - Wildy icon!?!
item.dc:creator: @Hunter_H Hunter H
item.description:
@Hunter_H wrote:

If i wanted to use delta client i would have. Don’t post useless messsages.

I’ve fixed it now anyway.
